note.p: Scottish sheep-farmer. Farmed at Pitbladdo, Cupar, Fife, 1861, 1871.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Cupar 10/10), 1871 (Cupar 420/10/10)
Correspondence vol. 17, letter from Thomas Russell to George Cupples, 18 June 1869
Scotland old parish registers births 431/20 3 Forgan (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 16 January 2020)
Scotland statutory deaths 420/155 Cupar (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 16 January 2020)
